FACTüö® SSVF is only so successful in reducing veteran homelessness because the matching funds aspect is not required by organizations that receive grants from the @DeptVetAffairs - which is why the grant program in the Improve Act was modeled on SSVF.

While suicide has no single cause and no single piece of legislation will prevent it completely, the IMPROVE Act is an opportunity to save veteran lives.
